document_data.name: Sesszemur
document_data.mainbody: '''Sesszemur''' was the [[halfling]] owner and manager of the popular luthdren (restaurant) [[Sesszemur's]], located in [[Khôltar]], [[south Faerûn]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|68}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 54: Khôltar, Part 5, The Farrgaunlar}}
document_data.Personality:
Sesszemur considered himself an epicure with refined tastes and used his trained palate to improve and perfect all dishes served in his luthdren. One of his specialties was [[Fruit jelly|fruit jellies]] made with imported, exotic ingredients. He was also a showman, creating huge edible sculptures out of roasted meats and vegetables which were served on [[silver]] platters so big it took many servers to bear them like a [[litter]].

Sesszemur's favorite pastime was gambling and he spent most of his time in the top-floor gaming rooms of his establishment.
